1.content: To start off, you need to decide which of the three FFXII girls you want to make fat!
1.title: Final Fantasy XII Female Weight Gain

choices: Fatten up only a specific part
11.content: So, you want to fatten up Ashe, the beautiful princess of Dalmasca, eh? Well, you need to decide HOW she gets bigger first!
11.title: Ashe

111.content:
As the Queen of Dalmasca, Ashe had a very strainous job. In between keeping the people of her nation happy and making sure the government stays intact, Ashe barely had any time to herself. As a result, any time she had to herself was spent on eating.

Due to all this, and a lack of exercise, Ashe started to gain weight...
111.title: Ashe's Weight Gain Starts!

1112.content:
After a few months of little exercise and constant eating, Queen Ashe had become quite fat. No longer the thin tight girl she once was, Ashe was now a bona-fide BBW. With a large protruding gut, thick thunder thighs, large jiggly breasts and a flabby double chin, she had changed drastically.

One day, after a huge feast, Ashe was lazily rubbed her full gut when she finally realized how soft and round it felt. Looking down, Ashe let out a cry as she saw how fat she had become.

Gently feeling her fat rolls, Ashe stared at her belly and thought...
1112.title: Ashe's a FAT girl!

choices: Ashe goes for the fatty meats
11121.content:
"So this is the result of being a queen, huh?" Ashe said to herself. "It looks like I can stuff myself stupid, and not worry about a thing!" She licked her lips and poked her belly once more.
"Mmmm, very soft. However, I'm certain I'm still too thin. I need to organise more food for myself. Let's see..." She called for a maid, who came quickly and bowed low, pretending not to notice that Ashe weighed well over 200 pounds.
"Your Majesty calls?"
"Tell the chef to prepare a big feast full of fatty meats and desserts that will serve 50 people" Ashe ordered.
"Who's going to this feast?" the maid asked.
"Just me. Hurry!" Ashe demanded. The maid nodded and ran off.

Later on, Ashe was seated in front of a massive banquet table full of the fattiest meats known to man, and delicious desserts.
"Oh, where to start. It all looks so delicious..."
11121.title: Advantage - Queen Ashe

11122.content:
Ashe was horrified that she had put on so much weight! How could this have happened to her? Okay, so she had been eating a bit more lately, but only a BIT!
"M-maybe I need a second opinion" she muttered, then called for one of the palace maid servants. "Do I look like I've gained a lot of weight of weight?"

"Ummm..." the young girl was extremely nervous. She had noticed the queen pigging out at meals lately, but being new here, the maid didn't want to make her angry. Still, it was hard to deny that she had gotten larger. "Well, maybe a few pounds at most, my queen" she said diplomatically. "It's hardly noticeable with your beauty."

"Whew!" Ashe said, easily placated. The vain queen was all too willing to be told she was still thin and beautiful. "Thank you for your honesty dear! You can have the rest of the day off. Oh, but on your way out could you grab me...
11122.title: This can't be true!

choices: She finds Vaan to put her on an excercise course
She rolls to the castle magician to find out what's wrong.
112.content:
After fighting the legendary battle against the Arcadian tyrants, the other characters split up to go their separate ways. Ashe took up the lead of ruling her kingdom of Dalmasca where everything was peaceful after the war. Though, since Ashe was the only one with a half decent amount of MP, her magic began to have it's side-affects. After a few months of the side-affects not taking place, one night there was an explosion which rocked the very foundations of the royal palace.

As she stared in the mirror a smile began to crack on her large, unhappy face since her body didn't seem to fit in her giant mirror. However the smile faded away since standing up took away most of her energy. She sat on her bed, unfortunately breaking it in the process, and began to think of what she should do.
112.title: The magic takes it's toll

choices: Ashe decides to fatten Fran up
113.content:
Ashe couldn't help herself as she glanced over at Fran for the umpteenth time; the Viera woman's sexy curvy body and deliciously lithe form made Ashe all the more hungry to stuff her into her empty belly.

'Of course, I'll need to get her to weaken so it'll be easier to eat her,' Ashe thought, 'I just want to eat her so badly, it hurts! I want to feel her in my nice, warm gut...' The princess' disturbing train of thought was suddenly interrupted when Fran noticed Ashe's stares.


Blushing, Ashe turned her eyes away and tried to think of how she can get to Fran easier...
113.title: Ashe Has Eyes For Fran

114.content: How else does the princess of Dalmasca get big?
114.title: Air/Water/Other Inflation

1141.content: Whose child does Ashe, princess of Dalmasca, bear?
1141.title: Expecting

115.content: Oh, you only want to make ONE part of her body bigger? Well then, make your choice! Unfortunately, you only have two...
115.title: Ashe's Breasts Or Butt?

choices: Inflate only a specific part of her body
12.content: So, you want to see the sexy Viera lady Fran become big and chubby, huh? Well, how shall she put on the pounds?
12.title: Fran

121.content:
After a rather difficult airship battle, Balthier and Fran had ended up stranded on a deserted island. With their airship's engines badly damaged, it would take them at least a month before they would get to leave. Fran, however, wasn't willing to wait that long.

After a long string of complaints from her, Balthier turned to her and shouted, "WILL YOU STOP COMPLAINING AND PLEASE SEE IF YOU CAN FIND SOME FOOD OR SOMETHING?" Sighing, Fran walked into the jungle that seemed to cover the entire island.

After a bit of searching, Fran came upon...
121.title: Will Work For Food

choices: Fran eats it all for herself
Fran brings some food back to Balthier
1211.content:
Fran let out a gasp when she came across a small village. There were several small shacks that surrounded the area. A statue of what appeared to be a large, overweight Viera woman stood in the middle of the village.

'What is this place?' Fran wondered. Suddenly, a small blue, bug-eyed creature walked out from one of the houses. Looking up at Fran, it let out a squeal of delight and several more blue creatures emerged.

Soon, they began offering her plates covered with food. Too hungry to pass it up, Fran gladly takes the food...
1211.title: The Village

12111.content:
'I guess I should bring some back to Balthier...' Fran thought as she stared at the food in her hands. Suddenly, she felt a pang of hunger in her stomach. 'Ah, screw it! I'm hungry!' Fran thought as she started stuffing the food into her mouth.

As she continued to feed, Fran sat down in a throne-like chair that the little blue people got for her. Her mind completely focused on eating, Fran didn't notice that the little alien villagers were staring at her slowly-inflating gut with awe.

When she was finally done, Fran had a nice big gut resting heavily on top of her now-thicker thighs. Fran let out a belch and, as she rubbed her swollen belly, moaned, "Oh...that was so good...thank you..."

Suddenly, one of the blue people walked up and said, "No, thank you, beautiful maiden. Now that you are here, we FAmians may finally have a new goddess to worship..." Fran was about to ask what the little guy was talking about, but she only let out another belch.

The FAmians gently caressed Fran's bloated gut as the rabbit girl slowly fell asleep. As she slipped into a dream world, Fran decided on what she should do...
12111.title: The FAmians

121111.content:
As her eyelids closed, a small smile spread out on Fran's face while she caressed her bloated gut. 'I don't care if I'm gonna get fat, I like it here!' the bunny girl thought happily as she drifted off to sleep...

As she slept, erotic and amazing dreams filled Fran's mind. She dreamt of being huge, swollen, and fat. She had a huge round belly that stretched out for miles. Her ass and boobs were gigantic as well. Even though she had become immobile, numerous chibi-versions of Balthier continued to stuff food down Fran's oversized gullet...






When Fran finally awoke, she noticed that...
121111.title: Deciding To Stay

choices: Balthier enters the story once again
1211111.content:
With a glazed look in her eyes, Fran looked down and smiled. Her belly, which was once bloated, hard and round from the stuffing, had become somewhat flabby and soft. However, it was hard to see it over her breasts, which had busted out of her armor and now hung shamelessly over her gut.

Her ass had gotten much bigger, too. Her nice round bubble butt curved well with her chunky jiggly thighs. She was starting to get a third chin, too. Even her arms felt chubbier!

Letting out a yawn, Fran felt her large bloated naked tits and licked her lips seductively. 'I'm starting to like this...' she thought happily. Turning to the FMians, she started to speak when...
1211111.title: Spreading Out And Getting Big.

choices: Have the FMians rub her belly
Push her belly to the limit; eat more food!
12111111.content:
Fran barely opened her mouth when a loud rumble from within the confines of her belly caused her flabby mass to slightly jiggle. Blushing, Fran patted her chubby gut and exclaimed, "It looks like I could use some more food, boys!"

Without a moment to spare, the FMians spun around and dashed away to whip up more food for their growing goddess. Pretty soon, Fran found herself piling pounds upon pounds of delicious fresh food down her gullet. She could practically feel her belly swell with delight as she feasted.

When Fran was stuffed and bloated, her belly had once again taken a round ball shape, but it was much much bigger this time. It was so full that her belly became a bit red due to strain from all the food. Spreading out her chunky jiggly thighs, Fran's belly rested heavily and she let out a loud belch.

'Damn, I ate a lot! I don't even think I can move!' Fran thought before accidently letting out a fart. Laying back, Fran decided what to do next...
12111111.title: Bloating And A Strained Belly

choices: Her belly had a little extra room.  Time for more food!
She was exhausted from all the eating and sitting around.  Time for a nap!
121111111.content:
Fran didn't feel like moving very much, and her stomach felt a little uncomfortable from her gorging. She motioned to the small creature's to come over.

"Can't you guys do something to make me a little more comfortable here?"

As soon as she said it, the FMians began running their hands over her large, taught stomach. At first it felt strange, but after a few moments, Fran began to feel very relaxed.

"Urrrrp!" The Vieran let out a large belch, then moaned in pleasure. As the massaged her, she could feel the pressure in her stomach letting up. She continued to belch as they massaged her globular middle and after awhile she sighed in pleasure and decided :
121111111.title: Relieving some tension

choices: Fran's body suddenly swells up with fat
1211111111.content:
After belching a few more times, Fran finally felt at ease. Gently rubbing her soft, round belly, she realized she could go for some more food. Noticing the sudden hungry look on her rabbit goddess' chubby face, the FMian leader turned to his servants and ordered them to hurry and fetch more food.

Pretty soon, Fran found herself stuffing her face with even more delicious food. She could practically feel her belly swell bigger and bigger as she ate. Suddenly, just a s Fran had finished off an entire ham, something happened...
1211111111.title: Back to the food!

choices: Fran freaks out and begins crying
Fran ignores the sudden change and continues eating
12111111111.content:
Letting out a small burp, Fran could feel a loud rumbling coming from within the confines of her fat belly. Clutching her gut in pain, Fran began groaning in pain as entire flabby body began to jiggle, causing her many folds of fatty tissue to bounce around everywhere. The FMians, however, just watched on with glee.

After a few seconds of constant jiggling, Fran's body suddenly puffed up. Her belly blew outwards and grew several sizes bigger and became completely round and soft, stuffed with delicious and fatty food. Fran's ass and legs puffed out with folds upon folds of fat, crushing the chair underneath her and lifting her huge swollen body about two to three feet off the ground.

Her face puffed out, giving her five large flabby chins and swollen chubby red cheeks. Her naked breasts blew up to immense sizes and bounced around wildly before resting on Fran's heavy belly. Finally, her arms and fingers became so chubbified that they were barely visible as her body continued to grow bigger and bigger. Fran also developed lots of new love handles and fat back rolls, as well. At this point, Fran was almost completely round.

Letting out another small belch, Fran looked down at her new bloated form...
12111111111.title: BIGGER AND BETTER!

choices: The over-accumulating gas in Fran's body causes her to expand

Letting out a small burp, Fran began feeling an incredible uneasiness in her fat belly. Suddenly, another belch erupted from within her lips, this time much louder. Fran was about to apologize when both a burp AND a fart came out at the same time.

Pretty soon, Fran found herself letting out more gas then she ever did in her whole life. The constant burps and farts she let out kept her from eating more food, which did nothing but ruin Fran's mood even more. 'This is so embarrassing!' Fran thought nervously as she let loose a rather loud fart, accidently knocking over several FMians in the process.

'I really hope this ends soon...' thought the viera girl as several burps exploded out of her mouth all at once.
12111111112.title: GASSY!!!

choices: The large amounts of gas in Fran's body makes her become airborne
Fran lets out a single huge belch that gets rid of the gas in her belly
121111111121.content:
Fran let out a moan as she more and more gas came out of her body. The air became dense and smelly as Fran farted a few more times, rather loudly. Suddenly, something else happened. Fran's belly began to slowly expand as she continued to belch. Her belly was swelling bigger adn bigger.

'Ugh...so much gas...my belly is growing...' Fran thought as her belly began to resemble that of an overswollen balloon. All the FAmians could do was watch in amazement...
121111111121.title: Too MUCH GAS!!!

choices: She farts, and her butt gets fatter
She belches, and her belly and boobs gets fatter
1211111111212.content:
Just when she felt like her belly was about to explode from the enormous amounts of gasses forming within it, Fran opened her mouth and a let out a single huge burp. It was so loud and powerful it not only sent the FAmians flying, but it knocked down some of their houses as well.

Fran tried to stop, but that single burp just kept going and going until it finally...stopped. Fran had never been so embarrassed. She wanted to go and apologize to the poor little FAmians, but she was too big and fat to even move. Brushing himself off, the FAmian Elder said, "My, my...that was quite a burp, princess. I was worried for a moment that you didn't have the ability to let out extreme amounts of gas...I guess you really are our new queen..."

Blushing at their kindness, Fran smiled and was about to speak, when...
1211111111212.title: A Huge Belch

12111111112121.content:
PFFFFTTTTTT! The fart sent some FAmians flying backwards and Fran's ass expanded even more and with the expansion she farted again and again. Finishing her gassy barrage with a tiny poot, Fran was again blushing.

"It's only natural princess. My look how big you've gotten. Would you like to be able to move around at any size?"

"Yes URP!" Fran said. The FAmian leader then cast a spell on her and Fran found she could move easily enough. She was about ready to leave when the FAmians stopped her.

"Before you go....could you fart one last time?" The leader asked.

"Of course." Fran said. The FAmians shoved two cans of beans down her throat and Fran turned around and bent over.

PFFFFFFTTTTTTTTTTT! The fart was the loudest they had ever heard. Balthier, tinkering on the Stahl heard it too.

"What on Earth was that?" Just then he saw his obese Viera friend waddling up to him. He started wide eyed.

"How do I BURRRP look Balthirer?" Fran asked.

What does Balthier say?
12111111112121.title: She farts, and her butt gets fatter

"You're beautiful Fran." At the compliment the Viera's huge cheeks turned red. She farted loudly and smiled sheepishly.

"Thank you Balthier, I hope you don't mind the gas." Fran farted again and Balthier held his nose.

"It's a natural action. I can't very well get mad at you for that." Fran smiled again and hugged Balthier tightly.

"I love you Balthier!" Balthier needed air and managed to cry out. When Fran say that she quickly released him and blushed. "Sorry..."

"It's quite alright love, although I don't know if the Stahl can take your newly aquired weight.

"Don't worry, I'll make the ship support me!" Fran said, eyes flashing at the prospect of the challenge. After tinkering for some hours Fran and Balthier were finished. Balthier stepped in and Fran followed. What happen's next?
121111111121211.title: Gorgeous

choices: Ashe, fatter and gassier than even Fran!
1211111111212112.content:
Although there was some groaning as Fran piled her 500 pound frame into the ship, it held as it always did. Fran's stomach rumbled and she farted loudly.

"Are you hungry Fran?"

"I'm starving Balthier! Are there any good buffet's in the area?"

"In Dalmasca I believe there is a restaurant called El Gluttono. The food is supposed to be the best in the world."

"Let's go there!" Fran said. Balthier smiled and took the controls.

"Alright, we're off to Dalmasca!"

Once they had landed they instantly sought out the restaurant. Fran was breathing heavily and her face was red after so much exercise. They paid for a booth and sat down. As soon as their plates were there Fran went off to get piles and piles of food. Returning to her seat she dug in. After binging for over an hour Fran let her fullness be known by releasing a massive belch along with some very stinky farts.

"That sated me." The Viera said. Suddenly a loud belch came from the table to their left. Looking over, both friends were shocked to see...
1211111111212112.title: The ship holds

choices: It's a tie. Both girls have a fart off to decide a winner!
12111111112121121.content:
Ashe had a content look on her face as she farted loudly. Suddenly noticing the stares of Fran and Balthier the Queen blushed.

"Hello you two. I'm sorry for my lack of manners..." But whatever she was going to say was cut off by Fran's loud fart.

"It's quite okay Princess. I'm obviously not as lithe as once I was and I must admit, releasing gas is pleasing to me these days." Fran then looked at Ashe's plates and noticed 5 of them stacked together. Ashe's creamy white gut was straining the buttons on her pants. "Would you like to have a contest Ashe?"

"What kind of contest?" Ashe asked.

"Just an eating contest. If you win I pay for our food. If I win you have to come with Balthier and I on a trip, deal?" Ashe nodded.

Both obese females then went and got plate after plate of food. Balthier had arranged for two tables to be put together. Both women then started eating at the ding of a bell. After an hour had passed...
12111111112121121.title: Ashe, fatter and gassier than even Fran!

121111111121211211.content:
After an hour had passed, all the food was gone and both women were bloated beyond belief. Ashe's clothes were bursting at the seams and her giant swollen gut was red and taut. Every button on her pants had popped off, as well as the zipper when the weight of her belly became too great. Ashe groaned and let out a blech, and her chair gave way from under her giant soft chunky ass, which passed gas as she hit the ground. Her face was puffy and round, and there was no way to hide the fact she had three fat chins. She belched again and, turning her head to Balthier, asked, "Ugh...did...did I win?"

However, Balthier was too busy staring at Fran's immense size to hear Ashe. The Viera's body had grown so much from all the food that she now resembled a giant dark-skinned gut with equally huge soft breasts and fat puffy butt cheeks that stuck out very far. Her thick thighs were flowing with fat that rippled like waves with even the slightest movement. The same went for every other part of her body, including her face which was so swollen and fat that her eyes were barely visible behind her chubby red cheeks.

"God...I'm so fat...so big..." Fran moaned, her mind stuck in a state of pure ecstacy. While Ashe felt somewhat jealous of Fran, she was also glad she wasn't THAT big yet.

"I believe it's obvious to see here that Fran is the winner! Ashe is going to need to follow through with her commitment..." Balthier exclaimed, trying his best to control any lustful urges he suddenly had for the hugely obese rabbit girl.

The room filled with gas as both girls belched and farted off most of their gigantic meal.

"So," Ashe asked Fran as she rubbed her bloated belly and waited for the fat from the food to settle in, "Since you won, that means I have to come with you guys on a trip...?"

Fran nodded and replied, "Yes. And I know just the place..."
121111111121211211.title: Fran won!

choices: Rest and start immediately in the morning
Pass the time with a belching contest
1211111111212112111.content:
Ashe could barely believe it when she waddled out of the airship onto the island Fran had described. Forwarned, the FAmians had prepared more food than she had ever seen. They quickly brought two thrones forward and the leader gathered all to come see.

"Joyous day, my people! Not only has our goddess returned, but she has brought another! Let us bask them in our hospitality and fill their ample bellies as tribute to our goddesses!"

Not even having to lift a finger, Ashe and Fran were set upon by the FAmians with trays of food, loaded to the limit. Fran looked proudly at Ashe as they began to fill her friend at a pace she deemed perfect.

"This is amazing, Fran! I never want to leave!"

Fran tried to talk around gulps as tehy began to feed her as well. "I knew you'd like it here. They'll feed us for as long as we wish."

Still in a competitive spirit after losing the eating contest, Ashe began demanding that she be fed faster. Fran picked up on the unspoken challenge immediately and demanded the same. The FAmians would never run out of food, so this went on for hours, neither girl giving in. When thier bellies began getting taller than the huts, even when laying flat on their backs, Ashe could take no more. She begged them to give her aching tummy a rest and sat massaging her aching middle. A dozen of the FAmians ran to assist her, quickly bringing the princess to comfort. Fran smirked and kept going until her belly stretched a foot further than Ashe's before signalling them to stop. She lay there moaning in pleasure, running her long nails gently over her taut gut.

"I suppose since I've been here before, I'm used to this."

"Want -hic- to have another -hic- go -hic- tomorrow?" Ashe asked. "I'll win next time!"

"You're on, princess!"

What does he say?

What does the FAmian say?

Opening her eyes Fran didn't fell fat anymore. Looking down she saw her rock hard abs and hated them. The FAmians were standing around her, eyes downcast.

"We didn't want to make you into something you're not." The leader said. Fran glared at him.

"Feed me some more! I want to be huge!" The FAians now had beaming smiles on their faces and they started shoving food into Fran's gullet.

After doing this for a few hours Fran was now a 400 pound beauty. Her once rock hard abs were now covered in a huge beer belly while her thighs and ass were larger than her stomach. Strangely enough, she could move well enough. Suddendly she farted loudly and a blush spread across her face.

Where do they go next?

122.content:
Fran was dancing to the flute her Viera friends were playing. As she was dancing beside other Vieras, the evil one made a sinister remark.

"Fran, are you anorexic?" She said with an evil confusion.

"NO!" Fran replied, looking at her delicate body. She noticed that she didn't even get winded, while the other girls were as exausted as a cow.

"I think Franny here is in the negatives." The antagonist woman said.

"She better stop jumping, or she'll fly away like paper." Another evil Viera said.

Fran got angry, and ran far far away. She went into a chocobo farm house. Then, channeling all of her energy into her palms, she stuck her hands into her chest, and manipulated her weight.

Fran now weighed 365 pounds. What should she do now?
122.title: Through Magic

choices: Eat the Moogles that work on the ship
123.content:
After their latest misadventure, Balthier and Fran ended up with barely any food left on their airship. Two days after no food, Fran had become extremely cranky. "I CAN'T BELIEVE YOU THREW ALL OF OUR FOOD TO THOSE ANIMALS THAT WERE CHASING US THREE DAYS AGO!" Fran shouted furiously as she clutched her growling stomach.

Balthier shrugged and replied, "I'm sorry, Fran, but it was the only way to get out of there alone! At least be glad you're alive!" And with that, he dropped the subject. Unfortunately for the sky pirate, He didn't know that when Viera become close to starvation, they sometimes resort to vore.

Rubbing her empty stomach, Fran eyed Baltheir with a hungry look in her eyes...
123.title: A Hungry Rabbit Girl

choices: Not enough. Binge on the little Moogles.
Fran is sated, and returns to Balthier.
1232.content:
Fran almost yelled at Balthier as she turned to leave the cockpit, groaning as she slammed the door closed. "There's got to be something left in the holds ... Something we missed. I could eat a chocobo at this point ..." The Veira said, heading off to the lower levels to scrounge every inch for something, anything edible!

The tall rabbit woman had picked through the miscellaneous cargo, opening crates of weapons, barrels that turned out to be fuel and alike, searching through about a quarter of the large cargo hold with nothing to show. That is until she rounded a corner and one of the familiar moogles looked up at her. Only three feet tall, it was at the end of a short isle, clipboard in hand, and jumped when it heard the groan of the Veira's belly, and looked up to see the woman licking her lips and advancing.

Fran hadn't thought about it until after the fact, automatically scooping up and devouring the little creature. Her gut rushed out with the addition of meat into a round pregnant looking sphere, jiggling as her meal struggled. The Veira gave her gut a firm pat, the round orb swaying as she strutted back out of the isle, enjoying the full feeling.
1232.title: Eat the Moogles that work on the ship

choices: Fran returns to her bed uninterrupted.
Someone or something stops the voreacious Veira.

Fran let out a belch as she laid a slim hand upon her struggling gut, feeling the Moogle within writhe about, feeling the utter fullness after starving for days. She wanted more. Caressing a belly that pushed out further than it ever had in her life, the Veira wanted more, and felt certain she could eat more. Needed to eat more.

Prowling the cargo hold in search of more Moogles, Fran mused on her luck that the armor she wore didn't cover her new gut, but also wondered just how fattening Moogles were. Though the Veira couldn't focus on such long term thinking, especially as the next little worker came into vire, perched precariously atop a stack of crated that put him just above the woman's head. Fran approached, her otherwise slim body strutting as her round gut swayed before her, the Moogle pausing at the sight of the woman just as she reached the crates, opening her mouth with what looked like a predatory grin.

One belly bump later, and the precarious worker found himself rabbit food as she swallowed the creature in a single gulp. The stack he had been working atop slowly tipped over with a clatter, as the Veira's gut grew larger still, now a full foot from her otherwise slim form. It shook and jumped with renewed struggles that only brought a satesfied moan to the predator's lips as she paused, using a crate to steady herself.

Two more darted out of the pile of over turned cargo, one running smack into the brown belly and falling to the floor. Fran stepped over the little morsel as the second darted out, her quick reflexes just managing to scoop up the Moogle's leg and lift him up toward her opening maw. As Fran's stomach swelled again, it pinned the stunned Moogle in place while the voreacious woman took a minute to rub her now significantly large belly with both hands, it's surface squirming and moving beneath them. The trapped Moogle was devoured quickly, Fran once more on her way search for more food, engorged gut bouncing off the sides of crates as she tried to maintain her sauntering walk.

"So much meat! Even the forest feasts can't compare." The Veira moaned, her belly beginning to hang down ever so slightly now past her hips, as her fingers just barely reached the furthest point. While quite the capable Hunter, searching was becoming quickly difficult as her stomach began to weigh the woman down. It was becoming visibly taught, the surface continuously shifting with the prey within, and on top of that the pleasure alone quickened the Veira's breath.

Riiip

The smallest sound caused Fran's rabbit like ears to swivel about, drawing her closer to another potential meal. Stalking along silently, her light skin brushed against boxes, barrels and cargo as her eyes spied a section of cloth torn on an erant nail. Holding her belly to try and still the writhing mass within, the hunter made her way as quickly as she could in her bloated state to the opposite end of the isle, even climbing over a small box or two in her path. The fifth Moogle barely even saw the hand as it came around the crate, it's world spinning and filled with the woman's pleasantly curved form, and her engorged gut as Fran smiled.

Finally done, the rabbit woman panted with her swollen belly as she made her way toward the cargo hold's exit, just beginning to waddle as her hands touched every inch of stuffed stomach they could. She was sated, but couldn't deny having over done it a little. Small as they were, five Moogles would make Fran quite ... plump, to say the least. Shaking her long silvery hair, she only hoped the old trend of junk making its way to her trunk would continue. Opening the door, and being thankful it was so large, the Veira suddenly stumbled, and nearly fell over something at her feet. Turning her big belly and looking down, she was half able to see a Moogle pointing up at the moving gut, about to ask when the Veira spoke first.

"Bunny fat for my big Veira ass. Which you're going to add too!"

This time was a bit slower, the bulge in her throat slow to descend, stomach inflating slowly enough for Fran to watch as she began to pant, and lean against the wall. Now she was stuffed. The feeling was amazing to Fran, both the vast excess of food, and struggling of her gut, but it tired the woman greatly. The gluttonous Veira shoved herself off the wall, and began to waddle back to the upper levels, looking to sleep off her meal. The round taught orb that jutted from her slender frame hung halfway down her thighs, their muscle ensuring she could support the gut as it jutted two feet from her body, surface continuously moving.

"Just eating Balthier wouldn't have been as big a meal." Fran mused, unable to stop running her new belly.
12321.title: The Veira's Moogle Munchies.

choices: The weight distributes itself evenly over her body.
Her new fat seems to center around certain places of her body.
123211.content:
Fran takes twice as long to waddle through the ship with a gut packed full of a half dozen Moogles that hangs halfway down her dark thighs. Making it into her room required a bit of squeezing, but the Veira enjoyed the challenge, stumbling into the room with a moan.

"What is that?" Balthier asked, standing between the engorged Veira and the bed, motioning to her squirming belly. The rouge placed a hand atop The tight belly as it pushed out looking up to see Fran grinning and running hands up her gut, over her modest bust, and through the long silvery hair.

"Be glad it isn't you Balthier." The bunny woman replied, pushing her fellow sky pirate over atop the bed with her incredibly bloated belly. With a grunt, and more strength then one would think her slim frame could manage, the Veira lifted her Moogle stuffed gut, and dropped it atop Balthier, pinning the man. "The Moogles proved a sufficient alternative to snacking on the captain."

The male sky pirate groaned as Fran climbed on the bed, pushing her stuffed gut into him further while he reached up to rub the expansive belly. "Ate the entire race did you? Didn't know Veira were so gluttonous!"

Fran let out a small giggle, closing her eyes, feeling her prey slowly struggle, and yawning. "We get pretty hungry when we're denied food for days." The predator said with a sting of venom, slapping the surface of her gut. "Besides, it's only six of the little morsels. Now move over, I need a long rest while you find somewhere with food."

Balthier managed to raise a hand into Fran's view with a groan. "Is that normal food, or more people? ... And there's not a lot of room while you're ..."

He was cut off with a glare from the Veira's red eyes as she let out a small belch, her stomach swaying softly as the meals within moved. "Either or. And I suppose you'll just be stuck then. Hopefully I don't want a midnight snack~"
123211.title: The predator rests.

choices: I want a chubby bunny! Soft with lots of squish.
Give me a pregnant looking Fran. Firm belly without rolls.
1232111.content: Does the weight make Fran fat all over, or settle in more of a pregnant looking figure, with a firmer, round belly?
1232111.title: A bloated bunny.

1232112.content: Fran has always been a little bottom heavy. Does that trend get more pronounced, or does the weight spread between an hourglass?
1232112.title: A thicker Veira.

choices: See just how good Hume Sky Pirate captain tastes.
Try to find other crew to make a meal of.
12321121.content:
Fran yawned, stretching and rising with a bit more difficulty than she remembered, walking with a slow strutt toward her armor, laid in a pile. She paused over it, her gaze down blocked by two significant breasts. The Veira's chest had been modest before, but not noticably large. Now however it was a heavy set of swollen teardrops sitting high upon her chest, the largest on the airship.

Turning, the tall, dark skinned woman walked to a full length mirror with a swing in her step, feeling more jiggle than she had before. Sure enough, her hips flaired out almost twice as wide as before, with thick thighs to match, the gap between them there, but narrowing. Her stomach was flat again ... mostly. Only a small curve on replaced the washboard, but it was far better than the enormous ball from the night prior. Her face and neck looked a tad softer, but escaped the worst of it, save her noticably plumper lips. The Veira's arms and shins looked only slightly larger, but the woman couldn't tell if it was new muscle or fat, not having lost her tone.

She bit a slightly larger lip in anticipation of, what was sure to be the worst area. Gathering up her silvery hair, the woman turned, and gazed down at her rear, only to smile. It was large, but not the fat ass she was expecting to be stuck with. The meaty rump jutted out like a shelf, large and round, but a little firm as she gave an experimental shake, watching for what jiggled. Fran was not dissapointed, and if anything, to not more eager to fill her gut like she had yesterday.

Turning back to her armor, Fran sighed, only to hear a voice vocalize the same thought. "Really gonna try to fit back in that? There's only so much strain metal can take Fran." Balthier spoke up, turning to look, or stare rather as the rabbit woman lifted a piece.

The Veira paused to glare as she licked her lips, stomach giving a growl while she replied. "Shush. I'm still mad at starving me. Might just add you to these bunny buns and make it that much harder. I bet Hume tastes good." Fran said, trying to squeeze into her armor while looking to both the door and Balthier.
12321121.title: Hourglass Fran.

125.content: Well, if its not the belly you're after, how about making Fran a bit more appealing for the guys who like woman with bigger breasts or a bigger butt?
125.title: Fran's Breasts Or Butt?

choices: Enlarge only a specific part of her body
13.content: How about sweet and perky Penelo? She may not be as well-rounded as the other two girls, but that can all be changed! Now, how shall she gain weight?
13.title: Penelo

131.content:
A big party was being held in Rabanastre, and of course Vaan and Penelo were in charge of the transportation of the food products. Though they thought they only had enough money for the required food. However, they went into Archades for it and Emporer Larsa gave them a huge discount, which meant they had a lot more food than they would have thought.

"It looks like enough to feed an entire city...." Basch commented as he loaded the stuff onto the airship with the crew.

When the ship got back to the port, it unloaded and the food was all prepared for the night. Migelo was worried about having too much leftovers, but this was a joyous celebration.

We all know Penelo is going to gorge on that extra food...but why?
131.title: Party time and extra food

134.content: Here a inflation for Penelo from Final Fantasy XII?
134.title: Air/Water/Other Inflation

135.content: Well then, should Penelo be top-heavy or bottom-heavy?
135.title: Penelo's Breasts Or Butt?

They can gain different ways as well, from just eating alot to the effects of magic causing gain! Please enjoy and, if you make up a new chapter, please make sure to use accurate spelling! Thank you!
